About Blog

My name is Benjy and I’m a UX designer

I have over 10 years experience designing digital things. I work at Leadin and organise a design meet-up in Swansea. I used to play bass and skateboard but I gave those things up because I was rubbish.

You might want to read my blog or find out a little more about me.
